content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":260092,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、よくやってくれたな、褒めてやろう、ガキ共。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, you did well. I'll praise you, kids."},{"lineNumber":260093,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、お父様である俺によくも","translatedEnglishLine":"But how dare you to your father, me,"},{"lineNumber":260094,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し照れが入っている偉そうな感じのランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance acting a bit embarrassed but all high and mighty."},{"lineNumber":260095,"originalJapaneseLine":"子供達、一人一人に接するランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance interacting with each of the children."},{"lineNumber":260096,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランス、お前なんか若い頃の俺に似てるな、気持ち悪いわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance, you remind me of my younger self, it's creepy."},{"lineNumber":260097,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺もだ、まったく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Same here, absolutely."},{"lineNumber":260098,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセット、しかしなんでお前は小さいままなんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset, but why do you remain small?"},{"lineNumber":260099,"originalJapaneseLine":"お父さんが安定してくれたら、この手の力を封印して成長するわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Once Dad stabilizes, I'll seal these powers and grow."},{"lineNumber":260100,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら今すぐしてもいいぞ、もう俺様は大丈夫だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then you can do it anytime now, I'm fine already."},{"lineNumber":260101,"originalJapaneseLine":"と言うか、３度も娘にビンタされたなんて有り得ない、もう二度とさせない","translatedEnglishLine":"Or rather, being slapped by my daughter three times is unthinkable, I won't let it happen again."},{"lineNumber":260102,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・他は赤ん坊の頃しか見て無いのだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...The others I've only seen when they were babies..."},{"lineNumber":260103,"originalJapaneseLine":"じろじろと見渡し、だいたい誰の子か分かってきたぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking around carefully, I've started to figure out whose child is whose."},{"lineNumber":260104,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前は、ザンスか、リアの子だな、大きくなったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"You, you're Zansu's or Ria's child, huh? You've grown up."},{"lineNumber":260105,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてお前は乱義、五十六の子だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"And you are Rangi, Isoroku's child, right."},{"lineNumber":260106,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前はマジックの娘スシヌだろ、赤ん坊の頃しか見た覚えがないがその眼鏡で分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"You are Magic's daughter, Sushinu, right? I've only seen you as a baby but I can tell by those glasses."},{"lineNumber":260107,"originalJapaneseLine":"まんま雰囲気がそっくりなので分かるが、お前はミラクルの子か","translatedEnglishLine":"Your entire vibe is exactly the same, so I know you are Miracle's child."},{"lineNumber":260108,"originalJapaneseLine":"わからん、こんな元気な奴は・・　シーラの子ですと自分で言う、ほう意外だな","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know, someone this lively... You say you're Sheila's child yourself? Oh, interesting."},{"lineNumber":260109,"originalJapaneseLine":"（元就、ウズメ、深根）はＩＦで存在確認してからなんらかの","translatedEnglishLine":"(Motonari, Uzume, Fukane) Their existence was confirmed in IF and then somehow..."},{"lineNumber":260110,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールはみんな率いたリーダーとして紹介される","translatedEnglishLine":"Eiru is introduced as the leader who has led everyone."},{"lineNumber":260111,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは誰の子かは分からない、エールが自分で言うクルックーの子だと","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know whose child Lance is, but Eiru says he's Kurokku's child himself."},{"lineNumber":260112,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、クルックーか、そういえばなんとなく似てるような気がする","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, Kurokku huh? Now that you mention it, I feel they do somewhat resemble each other."},{"lineNumber":260113,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺の子はこれで全てかとシィルかビスケッタに聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"I ask Seale or Biscetta if these are all of my children."},{"lineNumber":260114,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ、まだ何人かおられるかもしれません、それだけの事をされてきていますから","translatedEnglishLine":"No, there might still be some more. After all, you have done quite a lot."},{"lineNumber":260115,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ、そうか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I see..."},{"lineNumber":260116,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし・・やっぱりまずったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"However... this is still bad."},{"lineNumber":260117,"originalJapaneseLine":"男達を見る・・・　お前達はどうでもいいが","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at the men... I don't really care about you guys."},{"lineNumber":260118,"originalJapaneseLine":"女達を見る・・・リセットはともかく、くそっ、まだ若いがどいつも美人になりそうだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at the women... Except for Reset, damn, they are still young and all seem to be turning out beautiful."},{"lineNumber":260119,"originalJapaneseLine":"娘には手を出せない・・・俺様がやれない美女がこんなにいるなんて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't lay a hand on my daughters... There are so many beauties I can't have..."},{"lineNumber":260120,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにをいっているのなやらとかいう雰囲気で","translatedEnglishLine":"With an atmosphere like, 'What are you talking about?'"},{"lineNumber":260121,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ＣＧ：魔王ランスとシィル）","translatedEnglishLine":"(CG: Demon Lord Lance and Seale)"},{"lineNumber":260122,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景　魔王城玉座","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Demon Lord Castle Throne"},{"lineNumber":260123,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王ランスが偉そうにしている、膝の上にはシィル。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Lord Lance acting arrogantly, Seale is on his lap."},{"lineNumber":260124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここに居るキャラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Characters present here:"},{"lineNumber":260125,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ビスケッタ、サテラ、ホーネット、学者、リセット、クルックー","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta, Satera, Hornet, Scholar, Reset, Kurokku"},{"lineNumber":260126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260127,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、いろいろ迷惑かけたがもう大丈夫だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I've caused a lot of trouble but now it's all okay."},{"lineNumber":260128,"originalJapaneseLine":"この俺様、魔王ランスが全て完璧に統治してくれるわ、がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"I, Demon Lord Lance, will govern everything perfectly, gahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":260129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クルックーの心の声","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurokku's inner thoughts"},{"lineNumber":260130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごい上機嫌、自信満々ですね","translatedEnglishLine":"He's in an excellent mood, full of confidence."},{"lineNumber":260131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王になる前のランス、いえやっぱりシィルさんが側にいる時のランスです","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance before becoming Demon Lord, no, rather it's Lance when Seale is by his side."},{"lineNumber":260132,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスはこうでなくてはいけません","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has to be like this."},{"lineNumber":260133,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今のランスなら、魔王の血に飲み込まれる事なんか無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"With the current Lance, he won't be swallowed by the blood of the Demon Lord."},{"lineNumber":260134,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よかったです、ほんと","translatedEnglishLine":"It's really good."},{"lineNumber":260135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260136,"originalJapaneseLine":"このアメージング城に新たな俺様ハーレムを作るぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm going to create a new harem for myself in this Amazing Castle."},{"lineNumber":260137,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだな、シィル、サテラ、ホーネット、後志津香は入れてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, I'll include Seale, Satera, Hornet, and also Shizuka."},{"lineNumber":260138,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪いがクルックーとビスケッタさんは３０過ぎたから卒業だ。諦めてくれ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry, but Kurokku and Biscetta have passed 30, so they're graduated. Please give up."},{"lineNumber":260139,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル、あの私も・・もう結構な歳のはずですが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Seale: Well, I too... should be quite old by now..."},{"lineNumber":260140,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、長い間氷の中でいたからな時間が止まっていたのだろう、ほれほれ・・ピチピチだ","translatedEnglishLine":"No, you were in ice for a long time, so time probably stopped. See, still fresh."},{"lineNumber":260141,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだまだ俺様の奴隷は卒業させんぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"You won't be graduating from being my slave yet."},{"lineNumber":260142,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセット、娘の前で・・なんちゅう話を・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset: What kind of conversation is this to have in front of the daughters..."},{"lineNumber":260143,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、また世界中を旅して俺の女にふさわしいのを見つけよう。うむ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I'll travel the world again and find women worthy of being mine. Hmm."},{"lineNumber":260144,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、お前は自分が魔王という事をもっと自覚しろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera, you need to be more aware that you are the Demon Lord."},{"lineNumber":260145,"originalJapaneseLine":"また破壊衝動にかられて、人間共は皆殺しという状態になるかもしれないのだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"You might be driven by destructive impulses again and end up massacring all humans."},{"lineNumber":260146,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、サテラとしてはそれでもかまわんが","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I suppose Satera doesn't mind that."},{"lineNumber":260147,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス　・・・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance ........"},{"lineNumber":260148,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルをぎゅっと抱きしめ、大丈夫だ、なんとなく今度は大丈夫だ","translatedEnglishLine":"He hugs Seale tightly, 'It's alright, somehow this time it'll be fine.'"},{"lineNumber":260149,"originalJapaneseLine":"何かあったらまた私がビンタするし","translatedEnglishLine":"If anything happens, I'll slap you again."},{"lineNumber":260150,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、それはもういい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, that’s enough already."},{"lineNumber":260151,"originalJapaneseLine":"それまでに、なんとかする方法を見つけてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"By then, I'll find a way to fix it."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、よくやってくれたな、褒めてやろう、ガキ共。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you did well. I'll praise you, kids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、お父様である俺によくも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But how dare you to your father, me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し照れが入っている偉そうな感じのランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance acting a bit embarrassed but all high and mighty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供達、一人一人に接するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance interacting with each of the children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランス、お前なんか若い頃の俺に似てるな、気持ち悪いわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance, you remind me of my younger self, it's creepy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もだ、まったく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same here, absolutely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、しかしなんでお前は小さいままなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, but why do you remain small?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんが安定してくれたら、この手の力を封印して成長するわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once Dad stabilizes, I'll seal these powers and grow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら今すぐしてもいいぞ、もう俺様は大丈夫だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then you can do it anytime now, I'm fine already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言うか、３度も娘にビンタされたなんて有り得ない、もう二度とさせない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, being slapped by my daughter three times is unthinkable, I won't let it happen again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・他は赤ん坊の頃しか見て無いのだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...The others I've only seen when they were babies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じろじろと見渡し、だいたい誰の子か分かってきたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking around carefully, I've started to figure out whose child is whose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は、ザンスか、リアの子だな、大きくなったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, you're Zansu's or Ria's child, huh? You've grown up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてお前は乱義、五十六の子だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And you are Rangi, Isoroku's child, right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はマジックの娘スシヌだろ、赤ん坊の頃しか見た覚えがないがその眼鏡で分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are Magic's daughter, Sushinu, right? I've only seen you as a baby but I can tell by those glasses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まんま雰囲気がそっくりなので分かるが、お前はミラクルの子か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your entire vibe is exactly the same, so I know you are Miracle's child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わからん、こんな元気な奴は・・　シーラの子ですと自分で言う、ほう意外だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, someone this lively... You say you're Sheila's child yourself? Oh, interesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （元就、ウズメ、深根）はＩＦで存在確認してからなんらかの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Motonari, Uzume, Fukane) Their existence was confirmed in IF and then somehow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはみんな率いたリーダーとして紹介される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eiru is introduced as the leader who has led everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは誰の子かは分からない、エールが自分で言うクルックーの子だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know whose child Lance is, but Eiru says he's Kurokku's child himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、クルックーか、そういえばなんとなく似てるような気がする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Kurokku huh? Now that you mention it, I feel they do somewhat resemble each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の子はこれで全てかとシィルかビスケッタに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I ask Seale or Biscetta if these are all of my children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、まだ何人かおられるかもしれません、それだけの事をされてきていますから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, there might still be some more. After all, you have done quite a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ、そうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし・・やっぱりまずったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However... this is still bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男達を見る・・・　お前達はどうでもいいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the men... I don't really care about you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女達を見る・・・リセットはともかく、くそっ、まだ若いがどいつも美人になりそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the women... Except for Reset, damn, they are still young and all seem to be turning out beautiful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘には手を出せない・・・俺様がやれない美女がこんなにいるなんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't lay a hand on my daughters... There are so many beauties I can't have...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをいっているのなやらとかいう雰囲気で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With an atmosphere like, 'What are you talking about?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：魔王ランスとシィル）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Demon Lord Lance and Seale)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　魔王城玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Demon Lord Castle Throne

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスが偉そうにしている、膝の上にはシィル。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Lance acting arrogantly, Seale is on his lap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに居るキャラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Characters present here:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタ、サテラ、ホーネット、学者、リセット、クルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta, Satera, Hornet, Scholar, Reset, Kurokku

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いろいろ迷惑かけたがもう大丈夫だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I've caused a lot of trouble but now it's all okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この俺様、魔王ランスが全て完璧に統治してくれるわ、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, Demon Lord Lance, will govern everything perfectly, gahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの心の声
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurokku's inner thoughts

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい上機嫌、自信満々ですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's in an excellent mood, full of confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になる前のランス、いえやっぱりシィルさんが側にいる時のランスです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance before becoming Demon Lord, no, rather it's Lance when Seale is by his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはこうでなくてはいけません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has to be like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のランスなら、魔王の血に飲み込まれる事なんか無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the current Lance, he won't be swallowed by the blood of the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったです、ほんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアメージング城に新たな俺様ハーレムを作るぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to create a new harem for myself in this Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、シィル、サテラ、ホーネット、後志津香は入れてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I'll include Seale, Satera, Hornet, and also Shizuka.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪いがクルックーとビスケッタさんは３０過ぎたから卒業だ。諦めてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, but Kurokku and Biscetta have passed 30, so they're graduated. Please give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、あの私も・・もう結構な歳のはずですが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seale: Well, I too... should be quite old by now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、長い間氷の中でいたからな時間が止まっていたのだろう、ほれほれ・・ピチピチだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, you were in ice for a long time, so time probably stopped. See, still fresh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ俺様の奴隷は卒業させんぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You won't be graduating from being my slave yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、娘の前で・・なんちゅう話を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset: What kind of conversation is this to have in front of the daughters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、また世界中を旅して俺の女にふさわしいのを見つけよう。うむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll travel the world again and find women worthy of being mine. Hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、お前は自分が魔王という事をもっと自覚しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, you need to be more aware that you are the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また破壊衝動にかられて、人間共は皆殺しという状態になるかもしれないのだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You might be driven by destructive impulses again and end up massacring all humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、サテラとしてはそれでもかまわんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I suppose Satera doesn't mind that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルをぎゅっと抱きしめ、大丈夫だ、なんとなく今度は大丈夫だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hugs Seale tightly, 'It's alright, somehow this time it'll be fine.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かあったらまた私がビンタするし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If anything happens, I'll slap you again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、それはもういい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that’s enough already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでに、なんとかする方法を見つけてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By then, I'll find a way to fix it.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、よくやってくれたな、褒めてやろう、ガキ共。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you did well. I'll praise you, kids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、お父様である俺によくも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But how dare you to your father, me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し照れが入っている偉そうな感じのランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance acting a bit embarrassed but all high and mighty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供達、一人一人に接するランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance interacting with each of the children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランス、お前なんか若い頃の俺に似てるな、気持ち悪いわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance, you remind me of my younger self, it's creepy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もだ、まったく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same here, absolutely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、しかしなんでお前は小さいままなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, but why do you remain small?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんが安定してくれたら、この手の力を封印して成長するわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once Dad stabilizes, I'll seal these powers and grow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら今すぐしてもいいぞ、もう俺様は大丈夫だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then you can do it anytime now, I'm fine already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言うか、３度も娘にビンタされたなんて有り得ない、もう二度とさせない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, being slapped by my daughter three times is unthinkable, I won't let it happen again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・他は赤ん坊の頃しか見て無いのだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...The others I've only seen when they were babies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じろじろと見渡し、だいたい誰の子か分かってきたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking around carefully, I've started to figure out whose child is whose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は、ザンスか、リアの子だな、大きくなったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, you're Zansu's or Ria's child, huh? You've grown up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてお前は乱義、五十六の子だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And you are Rangi, Isoroku's child, right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はマジックの娘スシヌだろ、赤ん坊の頃しか見た覚えがないがその眼鏡で分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are Magic's daughter, Sushinu, right? I've only seen you as a baby but I can tell by those glasses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まんま雰囲気がそっくりなので分かるが、お前はミラクルの子か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your entire vibe is exactly the same, so I know you are Miracle's child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わからん、こんな元気な奴は・・　シーラの子ですと自分で言う、ほう意外だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know, someone this lively... You say you're Sheila's child yourself? Oh, interesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （元就、ウズメ、深根）はＩＦで存在確認してからなんらかの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Motonari, Uzume, Fukane) Their existence was confirmed in IF and then somehow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはみんな率いたリーダーとして紹介される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eiru is introduced as the leader who has led everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは誰の子かは分からない、エールが自分で言うクルックーの子だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know whose child Lance is, but Eiru says he's Kurokku's child himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、クルックーか、そういえばなんとなく似てるような気がする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Kurokku huh? Now that you mention it, I feel they do somewhat resemble each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の子はこれで全てかとシィルかビスケッタに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I ask Seale or Biscetta if these are all of my children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、まだ何人かおられるかもしれません、それだけの事をされてきていますから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, there might still be some more. After all, you have done quite a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ、そうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし・・やっぱりまずったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However... this is still bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男達を見る・・・　お前達はどうでもいいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the men... I don't really care about you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女達を見る・・・リセットはともかく、くそっ、まだ若いがどいつも美人になりそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the women... Except for Reset, damn, they are still young and all seem to be turning out beautiful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘には手を出せない・・・俺様がやれない美女がこんなにいるなんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't lay a hand on my daughters... There are so many beauties I can't have...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをいっているのなやらとかいう雰囲気で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With an atmosphere like, 'What are you talking about?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：魔王ランスとシィル）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Demon Lord Lance and Seale)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　魔王城玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Demon Lord Castle Throne

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスが偉そうにしている、膝の上にはシィル。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Lance acting arrogantly, Seale is on his lap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに居るキャラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Characters present here:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタ、サテラ、ホーネット、学者、リセット、クルックー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta, Satera, Hornet, Scholar, Reset, Kurokku

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いろいろ迷惑かけたがもう大丈夫だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I've caused a lot of trouble but now it's all okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この俺様、魔王ランスが全て完璧に統治してくれるわ、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, Demon Lord Lance, will govern everything perfectly, gahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの心の声
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurokku's inner thoughts

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい上機嫌、自信満々ですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's in an excellent mood, full of confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になる前のランス、いえやっぱりシィルさんが側にいる時のランスです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance before becoming Demon Lord, no, rather it's Lance when Seale is by his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはこうでなくてはいけません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has to be like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のランスなら、魔王の血に飲み込まれる事なんか無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the current Lance, he won't be swallowed by the blood of the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったです、ほんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアメージング城に新たな俺様ハーレムを作るぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to create a new harem for myself in this Amazing Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、シィル、サテラ、ホーネット、後志津香は入れてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I'll include Seale, Satera, Hornet, and also Shizuka.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪いがクルックーとビスケッタさんは３０過ぎたから卒業だ。諦めてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, but Kurokku and Biscetta have passed 30, so they're graduated. Please give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、あの私も・・もう結構な歳のはずですが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seale: Well, I too... should be quite old by now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、長い間氷の中でいたからな時間が止まっていたのだろう、ほれほれ・・ピチピチだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, you were in ice for a long time, so time probably stopped. See, still fresh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ俺様の奴隷は卒業させんぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You won't be graduating from being my slave yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、娘の前で・・なんちゅう話を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset: What kind of conversation is this to have in front of the daughters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、また世界中を旅して俺の女にふさわしいのを見つけよう。うむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll travel the world again and find women worthy of being mine. Hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、お前は自分が魔王という事をもっと自覚しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, you need to be more aware that you are the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また破壊衝動にかられて、人間共は皆殺しという状態になるかもしれないのだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You might be driven by destructive impulses again and end up massacring all humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、サテラとしてはそれでもかまわんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I suppose Satera doesn't mind that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルをぎゅっと抱きしめ、大丈夫だ、なんとなく今度は大丈夫だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hugs Seale tightly, 'It's alright, somehow this time it'll be fine.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かあったらまた私がビンタするし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If anything happens, I'll slap you again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、それはもういい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that’s enough already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでに、なんとかする方法を見つけてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By then, I'll find a way to fix it.
